name: jjimjilbang: haunted sauna (demo)
description:
A jjimjilbang  is a Korean-style sauna/public bath/spa. Since the Incident two years ago, the jjimjilbang at the edge of town has sat abandoned. Hana hears rumours that the place is haunted, and as a budding paranormal investigator, she has to check it out.

But she didn't expect to run into her own ghost.  

An RPGMaker demo made for Neophyte Studio's Narrative Game Jam #5. 15-30 minutes long; the first slice of a larger dish.

In this stage of development, Jjimjilbang is more of an RPG with horror theming than a proper horror game. It will have some heavier themes in the future, but for now, it's just retro RPG fun.

CONTROLS

WASD or arrow keys for movement

Enter to interact with objects

Esc to escape out of menus

CREDITS
